Gotify.Description: A plugin that allows you to send messages to a Gotify server.

Fields.ServerUrl-Help: The URL of the Gotify server
Fields.AccessToken-Help: The access token used to communicate with the Gotify server.

Gotify.Description: Sends a message to a Gotify server.

Fields.Message-Help: The message to send to the Gotify server
Fields.Title: Title
Fields.Priority-Help: The priority of the message being sent
